scripts.copy-assets: npm run create-dirs && copyfiles -f "src/styles/*" "public/styles/" && copyfiles -f "src/scripts/*" "public/scripts/" && copyfiles -f "src/templates/*" "public/templates/"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-index && npm run convert && npm run index
scripts.serve: npm run build && http-server public -c-1 --cors -d false -p 8081
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run serve
